|rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR5112; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Invalid FCC ID: NKRCMA ([[Wistron NeWeb]]) • [http://ciscorouternetwork.blogspot.com/2012/04/edgewater-edgemarc-200aw-wireless.html EW200 Series spec] Per the Ethernet OUI, this is a '''Runtop''' device. It is presumably using a '''Wistron NeWeb''' wireless module.. maybe a [[Wistron NeWeb CM9]] (FCC ID: NKRCM9). *Integrated ADSL2+ DSL modem works with all ADSL providers :(''AT&T, Verizon, Centurylink, Qwest, Bell, Acanac, Teksavvy'') *Integrated 802.11bg Wireless Router :Wireless supports WPA TKIP. No WPA2 support. *Integrated 4 port managed Ethernet switch with VLAN support. *Integrated VoIP (SIP and H.323) FXS and FXO ports. *Management: HTTP, HTTPS, SSH, Telnet, SNMPv1 and V3. ==Links of Interest== [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AW_A_QuickStartGuide.pdf Quick Start Guide] ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:EdgeMarc 200AW back.jpg| File:EdgeMarc 200AW label.jpg|
